When cast above 50 Mana, Blizzard's duration is increased by 4 seconds.
When Chain Lightning Critically Strikes, it has a 30% chance to form a Crackling Energy.
Hitting an enemy with Charged Bolts reduces their damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.
Fireball's Critical Strike Damage is increased by +20%, increased to +30% when hitting at least 3 enemies.
Fire Bolt generates 2 Mana when hitting an enemy.
Enemies continue Burning for 3 seconds after leaving Firewall.
You gain 25% Mana Cost Reduction while Flame Shield is active.

Mana Cost: 40
Lucky Hit Chance: 33% (per use)
Summon a frigid blizzard that deals {#}% damage and continually Chills enemies for 18% over 8 seconds.
Frost Bolt makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Frost Nova makes enemies Vulnerable for 4 seconds, increased to 6 seconds against Bosses.
Frozen Orb's explosion restores 5 Mana when hitting a Frozen enemy.
Hydra also Burns enemies for an additional 60% of its Base damage dealt over 6 seconds.
Damage against Vulnerable enemies contributes 50% more to Ice Armor's Barrier.
20% of Enhanced Ice Blades's Cooldown reduction is applied to your other Skills.
Hitting an enemy with 5 Ice Shards in a single cast makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Enemies deal 25% less damage while Burning from Incinerate.
Each time Spark hits an enemy it has a 4% chance to form a Crackling Energy.
Collecting Crackling Energy increases the damage of your next Lightning Spear cast by x20%, up to x160%.

Mana Cost: 40
Lucky Hit Chance: 4% (per hit)
Unleash an orb that Chills for 34% and expels piercing shards, dealing a total of {36/39.6/43.2/46.8/50.4/54/57.6/61.2/64.8/68.4}% damage. Upon expiration, Frozen Orb explodes, dealing {34/37.4/40.8/44.2/47.6/51/54.4/57.8/61.2/64.6}% damage and Chilling enemies for 8.7%.
Meteor falls 30% faster.
For 4 seconds after Teleporting, Crackling Energy hits 2 additional enemies.
After Teleporting, you gain 30% Damage Reduction for 3 seconds.
Meteor's impact Immobilizes enemies for 2 seconds.
Lightning Spear Stuns enemies for 2 seconds when Critically Striking.
Spark grants +2% increased Critical Strike Chance per cast for 5 seconds, up to +8%.
Fireball deals 10% of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.
Every 3 seconds an enemy has been hit by Incinerate, they are Immobilized for 1 seconds.
While you have a Barrier active, Ice Shards always receives its bonuses against Frozen enemies.
Your Ice Blades gain +10% increased Attack Speed per active Ice Blades.

Cooldown: 20 seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: 5% (per hit)
Conjure a spear of lightning that seeks out enemies for 6 seconds, dealing {15/16.5/18/19.5/21/22.5/24/25.5/27/28.5}% damage per hit.
Enemies that hit you while Ice Armor is active have a 15% chance to become Frozen for 3 seconds.
After you Critically Strike, your Hydras gain +30% Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds.
Frozen Orb's explosion has a 30% chance to make all enemies hit Vulnerable for 2 seconds. Frozen Orb always makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable.
Frost Nova generates 4 Mana per enemy hit.
Frost Bolt generates 4 Mana when hitting Chilled or Frozen enemies.
Flame Shield Heals you for 50% of your missing Life.
You gain x5% increased Mana Regeneration per active Firewall, up to x35%.
Fire Bolt increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by x25% for 3 seconds.
Charged Bolts deals x25% increased damage to Stunned enemies.
Each time Chain Lightning bounces, it deals x5% increased damage for its duration.

1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.desc: Skills using this weapon deal x{0.2/0.4}% increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose 2.0 Fury every second.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.flavor:
"Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. Our blood brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day."
- Sorrowsong for Ramaladni
1HSword_Unique_Barb_101.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus

1HSword_Unique_Barb_102.desc: Lucky Hit: Your Core Skills have up to a 20.0% chance to Freeze enemies for 3.0 seconds and deal {#} Cold damage to them.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_102.flavor: The ancient runeblade of the angel Izual, Azurewrath was miraculously spared the corruption that consumed its master.
1HSword_Unique_Barb_102.name: Azurewrath

2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take x{30/50}% increased damage from you for 3.0 seconds.
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength."
- Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster
2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.name: Ancients' Oath

2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Upheaval ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {#}% damage over 4.0 seconds.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.name: Hellhammer

2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.desc: Death Blow creates a shockwave, dealing {24/38}% of its Base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset Death Blow's Cooldown.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that live in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.
2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.name: Overkill

2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with Rupture creates a blood pool that inflicts {#} Bleeding damage over 6.0 seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take x20% increased Bleeding damage.
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.flavor:
"We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on."
- Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior
2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.name: Fields of Crimson

Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.desc: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by 2. While you have maximum Frenzy, your other Skills gain +{35/45}% increased Attack Speed.
Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"The change that overtook my brother in battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear."
- Captain Dervin
Amulet_Unique_Barb_100.name: Battle Trance

Boots_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After gaining the final damage bonus from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain {32/50} Fury. This cannot happen more than once every 15 seconds.
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home."
- A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos
Boots_Unique_Barb_100.name: 100,000 Steps

Chest_Unique_Barb_100.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a {20/40}% chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your Non-Ultimate Skills by 1.5 seconds when you inflict Bleeding on Elites.
Chest_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat was destroyed along with the Worldstone. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.
Chest_Unique_Barb_100.name: Rage of Harrogath

Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Whirlwind explodes every 2.0 seconds and after it ends, dealing {16/26}% of the Base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The brutish construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

Helm_Unique_Barb_100.desc: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you have a {40/60}% chance to become more enraged granting x15.0% increased damage, 2.0 Fury per second, and 10.0% Cooldown Reduction.
Helm_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: As he fought with side by side with Raekor to liberate the labor camp, Joritz claimed this dented helm from a fallen foe. As his legend grew, its unique shape became synonymous with his great deeds.
Helm_Unique_Barb_100.name: Tuskhelm of Joritz the Mighty

Ring_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After spending 100 Fury within 3.0 seconds, your next cast of Hammer of the Ancients, Upheaval, or Death Blow is a guaranteed Critical Strike and deals x{10/30}% bonus Critical Strike Damage.
Ring_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"Anger brings strength but clouds the mind. You must learn to focus your fury, direct it with purpose. Keep our sacred duty at the forefront of your mind, always."
- Talic, to Madawc
Ring_Unique_Barb_100.name: Ring of Red Furor

1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.desc: Gain Stealth for 2 seconds when killing enemies with Shred. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants Ambush which guarantees Critical Strikes for {1/2.5} seconds.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The frenzy has begun to rise, yet the night is just dark enough to obscure a hunter from their prey's sight.
1HAxe_Unique_Druid_100.name: Waxing Gibbous

1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Debilitating Roar and Blood Howl deal {#}% damage to Nearby Poisoned enemies, increased by x10.0% for every 100.0 Willpower you have.
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"This weapon is a reminder of the unbridled savagery of our druidic ancestors, the wisdom of which I see more clearly with every day that passes."
- Moreg, Druidic Scholar
1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.name: Fleshrender

2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Claw is now a Storm Skill and also casts Storm Strike at {120/150}% normal damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-Géar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery to us all. However, approach her with deference; she may grant you her counsel."
- Airidah, to Donan
2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.name: Greatstaff of the Crone

Amulet_Unique_Druid_100.desc: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active will cause your boulders to rotate around you.
Amulet_Unique_Druid_100.flavor: As the hateful mob beat on his door, he gripped the pulsing shard tightly and screamed for calm. When he opened his eyes, all that greeted him was silence and the blood-smeared ruins of his cottage.
Amulet_Unique_Druid_100.name: Dolmen Stone

Chest_Unique_Druid_002.desc: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain +3 Ranks to all Werewolf Skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.flavor:
"He was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." 
– Tale of the Mad Nobleman
Chest_Unique_Druid_002.name: Mad Wolf's Glee

Chest_Unique_Druid_003.desc: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain +3 Ranks to all Werebear Skills.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.flavor: When the Days of Ash began, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect Túr Dúlra from Astaroth's flames.
Chest_Unique_Druid_003.name: Insatiable Fury

Helm_Unique_Druid_100.desc:
Lucky Hit: Storm Skills have up to a {15/25}% chance to grant 4.0 Spirit.

Your base Storm Skills are now also Werewolf Skills
Helm_Unique_Druid_100.flavor:
"Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony."
– Airidah
Helm_Unique_Druid_100.name: Tempest Roar

Helm_Unique_Druid_101.desc: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for {#}.
Helm_Unique_Druid_101.flavor:
"Roots from the Great Oak growing at the seaward statue of Vasily will, on rare occasions, be found twisted back upon themselves, suffused with ferocious magic."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Helm_Unique_Druid_101.name: Vasily's Prayer

Pants_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Your Wolf Companions are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the Storm Howl ability.
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply."
- Vasily, to Bul-Kathos
Pants_Unique_Druid_001.name: Storm's Companion

Ring_Unique_Druid_003.desc:
Gain a bonus when you kill with a Shapeshifting Skill:
• Werewolf: Your next Non-Ultimate Werebear Skill costs no Resource and has no Cooldown.
• Werebear: Your next Werewolf Skill will Heal you for {#} when damage is first dealt.
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.flavor:
"By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-Géar! For Scosglen!"
- Nafain, during the Days of Ash
Ring_Unique_Druid_003.name: Hunter's Zenith

Ring_Unique_Druid_100.desc: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again 5.0 seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal {250/500} Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by x1% per 1.0 point of Willpower you have.
Ring_Unique_Druid_100.flavor:
"When I was born, I breathed in the wind and the storm and they gave me life. When I die, I will breath out, and return that gift to the skies."
- Journal excerpt
Ring_Unique_Druid_100.name: Airidah's Inexorable Will

1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: When you Critically Strike an enemy you have up to a 100.0% chance to Fear and Slow them by {61/75}% for 4.0 seconds.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25% chance to deal {#} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by 20.0% for 5.0 seconds.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has reappeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

2HStaff_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain a random Shrine effect for 20 seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every 30.0 seconds.
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"The angel Lycander left us a portion of her power in this spear. It is all the proof I need that she watches over us still."
- Oracle Argoysni
2HStaff_Unique_Generic_100.name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander

2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Increases your Critical Strike Damage by x100%. The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain 30.0 Maximum Resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain 3 Resource for every 1.0% of Life you would have lost instead.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Amulet_Unique_Generic_101.desc: After you spend 300.0 of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal x{80/120}% increased damage.
Amulet_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"His name has been lost to history, but to have been exiled from a land as cursed as Hawezar, his deeds must have been truly depraved."
- Scholar's Notes
Amulet_Unique_Generic_101.name: Banished Lord's Talisman

Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc: You leave behind a trail of frost that Chills enemies. You deal x{7/10}% more damage to Chilled enemies.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Boots_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Each enemy you Evade through reduces your active Ultimate Cooldown by {2/4} seconds, up to 10.0 seconds.
Boots_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Considered a failure by their creator, it wasn't until the assassination of an "untouchable" Caldeum noble that these boots' true power was understood."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Boots_Unique_Generic_002.name: Flickerstep

Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Chest_Unique_Generic_101.desc: Your Healing Potion no longer Heals instantly, instead it grants a Barrier for 200.0% of the healing for 4.0 seconds. While you have a Barrier, you gain {10/20}% Damage Reduction.
Chest_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"To create such an artifact would require an impossible mastery over alchemy, transmutation and the subtle magics of the soul. By all rights, it should not exist, yet it does."
- Artisan Callas
Chest_Unique_Generic_101.name: Soulbrand

Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal 1% to {200/300}% of their normal damage.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a {15/25}% chance to Freeze enemies for 2.0 seconds.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a 20% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies {#} Poisoning damage over 5.0 seconds to enemies in the area.
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Gain 20% Damage Reduction. In addition, gain +4.0 Ranks to all Skills.
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin disguised as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king's entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Helm_Unique_Generic_003.desc: When you Stun, Freeze, or Immobilize an Elite enemy, or damage a Boss, it Pulls In Nearby enemies. You deal x{30/60}% increased damage to them for 3.0 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 12.0 seconds.
Helm_Unique_Generic_003.flavor:
"The Sahptev faithful believe in a thousand and one gods. If it takes me as many lifetimes, I will find and kill them all."
- Gaspar Stilbian, Veradani Outcast
Helm_Unique_Generic_003.name: Godslayer Crown

Pants_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Effects that Heal you beyond 100.0% Life grant you a Barrier up to {40/80}% of your Maximum Life that lasts for 8.0 seconds. Potions can be used while at full Life.
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Pants_Unique_Generic_100.name: Temerity

Pants_Unique_Generic_101.desc: When you take damage from a Non-Physical damage type, you gain +{6/10}% Maximum Resistance to that damage type for 6.0 seconds. This effect can only apply to one damage type at a time.
Pants_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"May the Light of Father Inarius shine down upon all weary travelers of this holy land. Turn your face toward his radiance and find your strength renewed."
- Statue Inscription
Pants_Unique_Generic_101.name: Tassets of the Dawning Sky

Pants_Unique_Generic_102.desc: You deal x{20/40}% increased damage while Unstoppable and for 4.0 seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain 50.0 of your Primary Resource.
Pants_Unique_Generic_102.flavor:
"The younger apprentices think wearing heavy plate in the swamps is foolish. They fail to understand that our armor is our legacy, and without it we are nothing."
- Crusader Pembroke
Pants_Unique_Generic_102.name: Tibault's Will

Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a Core Skill hits 4.0 or more enemies, {20/40}% of the Resource cost is refunded.
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Every tome, every scroll, every book in this temple produces the same answer. The only being willing to stand against the Eternal Conflict, against the Prime Evils, was Lilith."
- Elias
Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Mother's Embrace

Ring_Unique_Generic_101.desc: Casting a Core Skill cast reduces the Resource cost of your Core Skills by 12%, up to a maximum of 40.0%. Resets upon using a non-Core Skill.
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough."
- Unknown
Ring_Unique_Generic_101.name: Ring of Starless Skies

Ring_Unique_Generic_102.desc: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a 50.0% chance to erupt, dealing {#}% damage of the same type to Nearby enemies.
Ring_Unique_Generic_102.flavor: Skulking in the shadows of the Realm of Destruction, the Scarred Baron plots the downfall of the mortal who banished him there.
Ring_Unique_Generic_102.name: X'Fal's Corroded Signet

1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Corpse Explosion consumes up to 4.0 additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing x{122/130}% increased damage and with a {21/25}% larger radius per additional Corpse.
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The scrolls describe a river of tar that separated the living from the land of the dead. Any unfortunate soul who tried to cross would be dragged down into oblivion."
- Notes of Scholar Kamien
1HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Black River

1HShield_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Lucky Hit: While you have an active Bone Storm, hitting an enemy outside of a Bone Storm has up to a {5/25}% chance to spawn an additional Bone Storm at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increase the chance by 25% and the total additional Bone Storms you can have by 1.0.
1HShield_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Initially an unpopular choice to replace Mendeln as Deathspeaker, Daros quickly proved his worth with the creation of this masterpiece.
1HShield_Unique_Necro_100.name: Lidless Wall

2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to 100.0% and deal x{20/50}% increased damage to Frozen enemies.

Lucky Hit: Your Darkness Skills have up to a 100.0% chance to generate {7/10} additional Essence against Frozen targets.
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"My companion swung her odd weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever."
- The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI
2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Bloodless Scream

Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Blood Surge casts a mini nova on your Minions, dealing {#}% damage. Damage is increased by 10.0% per target drained by the initial cast, up to 50.0%.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker became a proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.
Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant

Boots_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Create Desecrated Ground beneath your Sever spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for {#} Shadow damage over 2.0 seconds.
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The massive door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen men to close, was thrown open. Had I known the horrors to come I never would have set foot inside!"
-The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII
Boots_Unique_Necro_100.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb

Chest_Unique_Necro_101.desc: When you pick up {5/10} Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.flavor:
"The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion this eldritch armor."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Chest_Unique_Necro_101.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass

Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Instead of detonating immediately, Corpse Explosion summons a Volatile Skeleton that charges at a random enemy and explodes. Corpse Explosion's damage is increased by x{30/40}%.
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!"
- Ravings of Madman Gustav
Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.name: Howl from Below

Helm_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing {#}% damage, increased by x5.0% for every 30.0% of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Rathma is endless. He was the first Ancient, and will remain at the end. He is the master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death comes for him, why should he fear it?"
- Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma
Helm_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathless Visage

Pants_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your Minions have a {3/7}% chance to curse enemies.

Enemies affected by at least 1 of your curses take x70.0% increased Overpower damage from you.
Pants_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: A naturally occurring curiosity, the blood moon persists as a sign of woe for the most superstitious Zakarum faithful. Children born under it are often considered cursed and cast out, lest it spread.
Pants_Unique_Necro_100.name: Blood Moon Breeches

Ring_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10.0% chance to empower all of your Minions, causing the next attack from each to explode for {#} Physical damage.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The signet of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The immense power over death held within, however, has not diminished.
Ring_Unique_Necro_100.name: Ring of Mendeln

Ring_Unique_Necro_101.desc:
You automatically activate the following equipped Skills on Corpses around you:
• Raise Skeleton every {1/2} seconds.
• Corpse Explosion every {1/2} seconds.
• Corpse Tendrils every {8/16} seconds.
Ring_Unique_Necro_101.flavor: The mere proximity of a practitioner of such dark arts can rouse the dead and disturb those souls who have earned their rest.
Ring_Unique_Necro_101.name: Ring of the Sacrilegious Soul

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: Your Core Skills deal x{20/40}% increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Basic Skills using this weapon have a 30% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers."
- Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Condemnation

1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.desc: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by +{4/6}% for 4.0 seconds, up to +{20/30}%.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.
1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.name: Asheara's Khanjar

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you have maximum stacks of the Precision Key Passive when you cast a Core Skill, that Skill gains x{10/20}% increased Critical Strike Damage and you gain {5/10} Energy.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"Genai took up her bow and aimed at the sun itself. The light burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night."
- Fable of the Great Sky-Hunt
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Skyhunter

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.desc: Lucky Hit: Hits with this weapon have up to a {20/30}% chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.flavor:
"There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.name: Windforce

2HBow_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Penetrating Shot has a {30/80}% chance to fire an arrow that bounces off walls and scenery. Damaging 5.0 enemies with Penetrating Shot will cause the next cast to make enemies hit Vulnerable for 3.0 seconds.
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"Scholars have been unable to decipher the runes carved into this bow, however all agree they are related to its uncanny ability to bend arrows towards their targets."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HBow_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Eaglehorn

Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements at once.
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not."
- Proclamation of Hakan II
Amulet_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Word of Hakan

Chest_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: While you have unlimited Energy from Inner Sight, casting a Core Skill has a {60/80}% chance to spawn Caltrops, Poison Trap, or Death Trap.
Chest_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"Rumor has it he lost them in a game of Skull & Anchor, but the boss is a devil with the dice. I think he wanted to give the poor sod something to keep him warm without wounding his pride."
- Elstir
Chest_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Scoundrel's Leathers

Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Marksman or Cutthroat Skill has up to a {24/34}% chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor: Dark wisps creep hungrily across these gloves, like an assassin's blade seeking a life to steal on a moonless night.
Gloves_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Grasp of Shadow

Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: You gain x{15/25}% increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." 
- Excerpt from a burned parchment
Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Cowl of the Nameless

Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.desc: Death Trap deals x{30/50}% increased damage. Unless it hits a Boss or Player, Death Trap will continue to re-arm itself until it kills an enemy.
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.flavor:
"And so, when the sun dipped behind the hills each night, he knew that Ashen Jack would soon be near. Watching, and waiting."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "Each Long Night"
Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.name: Eyes in the Dark

Ring_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: Casting a Subterfuge Skill leaves behind a Decoy Trap that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. The Decoy Trap explodes after 3.0 seconds dealing {1000/1500} Shadow damage. Can occur every 12.0 seconds.
Ring_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor: The ring shifts and spins on your finger as the forces within desperately attempt to escape.
Ring_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Writhing Band of Trickery

1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: While Channeling Incinerate, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, each dealing {#} Fire damage.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Flamescar

1HWand_Unique_Sorc_101.desc: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment you are taken to a random location.
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_101.flavor:
"The rhythm of the orb, which had pulsed steadily for five centuries, quickened as its owner took his final ragged breaths. It were as if some intelligence within reveled in the sight."
- Master Eos
1HWand_Unique_Sorc_101.name: The Oculus

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: Every 3rd cast of Fireball launches 2 additional projectiles and deals x{20/40}% increased damage.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor:
"Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." 
- Josiah
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Staff of Endless Rage

2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Your casts of Charged Bolts have a {30/50}% chance to be attracted to enemies and last 300.0% longer.
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"Also known as the Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Staff of Lam Esen

Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Upon collecting Crackling Energy, there's a 15.0% chance to release a lightning nova, dealing {#} Lightning damage, increased by x50.0% for every 100.0 Intelligence you have.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.
Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo

Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {20/30}% of your Movement Speed bonus.
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"While scholars have proven these boots were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down since the formation of the Mage Clans."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Boots_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esu's Heirloom

Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: After using Teleport, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {2/3} seconds, but Teleport's Cooldown is increased by x20.0%.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: The power you have is never enough.
Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Raiment of the Infinite

Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: Fireball now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {25/35}% less damage.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to reignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: the Cathedral of Light.
Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Gloves of the Illuminator

Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Enemies that die while Frozen have a {11/20}% chance to unleash a Frost Nova.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked the cloth, but refused to stay the needle and thread for even a moment.
Pants_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Iceheart Brais

Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy has up to a 30.0% chance to form an exploding Ice Spike, dealing 0 Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is Frozen.
Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"Her lover's spirit faded, and in her sorrow she wept frozen tears. Where they fell, roses of the purest ice would blossom each winter."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 7: "The Myth of Irina Coldheart"
Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Blue Rose

Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.desc: For each type of Elemental damage you deal, gain x{10/15}% increased damage for 4.0 seconds. Dealing Elemental damage refreshes all bonuses.
Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.flavor:
"Fool said he dug it out of the sands near Lut Gholein with a few other 'worthless trinkets'. I hid my delight at receiving such a treasure in exchange for a meager handful of coins."
- Rakhaan
Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.name: Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop
